sections.description: Comment Expirator allows to schedule closing of comments, trackbacks and pingbacks on an individual basis at a date or time of your choice. It can be activated on any post type that allows comments. This is good for preventing spam on old posts. The plugin lets you chose if trackbacks and pingbacks should also be closed at the same time.
sections.installation:
1. Upload comment-expirator folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the Comment Expirator in Settings > Comment Expirator menu.
